TopicTitle: Lag with <200 part station. Is it my computer, or is this just how it is?

Articles.Content:
I have some lag with <200 part station. I feel I was able to do 400 part stations with .90 64 bit install. Is it because of the 32 bit install that I'm having lag now, or is it my computer?

AMD A10-5800K

8.00GB Dual-Channel DDR3 @ 666MHz

MSI FM2-A85XA-G65 (MS-7793)

1023MB NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 (EVGA)

Windows 7 64 bit

As far as mods, all I have are some NEAR part mods, SpaceY, Taurus HCV, Corvus, and the kerbal joint reinforcement mod.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-01T02:25:28Z" title="06/01/2015 02:25  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 1, 2015</time> by MarcAlain**
